xs.$description:
Portrait mobile
applying styles to very small screens (by default), then using this breakpoint to override

sm.$description:
Landscape mobile, phablet
collapsed mobile menu single-column list/detail views

md.$description:
Tablet
expanded primary navigation fixed left sidebar navigation

lg.$description: Laptop tight column layouts sticky sidebar in api ref

2xl.$description:
Widescreen
largest screen sizes, widescreen viewing

xs.$description:

Control icon size for xs button (1rem≈16px)

sm.$description:
--control-icon-size-sm
Control icon size for sm button (1.125rem≈18px)

md.$description:
--control-icon-size-md
Control icon size for md button (1.125rem≈18px)

lg.$description:
--control-icon-size-lg
Control icon size for lg button (1.125rem≈18px)

xl.$description:
--control-icon-size-xl
Control icon size for xl button (1.125rem≈18px)
